content: my husband requested a simple cowl to wear while he rides his motorcycle taking his requests i came up with this very easy and fast knit it is perfect for a last-minute gift the instructions below are for a longer cowl that is to be worn doubled over - as in the photos but you could take this idea and make it larger or smaller depending on how you would like for it to fit **yarn** approximately 165 yards/75 grams of worsted weight yarn sample was knit in knit picks swish worsted in the cobblestone heather colorway 100% superwash merino wool 110 yards/50 grams **needles** us 8/5 0mm circular needles 16 cable you could also use double pointed needles or work this up in magic loop using a longer cabled circular **materials** - stitch marker - tapestry needle for weaving in ends **gauge** unblocked 4 25 stitches/6 5 row per 1 inch **finished size** unblocked approximately 12 in length/14 in circumference - unstretched
